Class ActivityFilterSetBase

java.lang.Object
gw.api.filters.FilterSetBase
gw.api.activity.ActivityFilterSetBase
Direct Known Subclasses:
ABContactActivityFilterSet, DesktopActivityFilterSet, DesktopAwaitingAssignmentFilterSet, TeamActivityFilterSet, WorkplanFilterSet
public class ActivityFilterSetBase extends FilterSetBase
Set of basic filters for activities.
